detectors.description:

	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#11)

	- Token.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#13)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#14)
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#15)

detectors.description:
StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#24-31) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#26)
	- balances[_to] += _value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#27)

detectors.description:
UDEFI.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#81-91) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- totalEthInWei = totalEthInWei + msg.value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#82)
	- amount = msg.value * unitsOneEthCanBuy (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#83)
	- balances[fundsWallet] = balances[fundsWallet] - amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#86)
	- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender] + amount (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#87)

[UDEFI.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#L81-L91) may have integer overflow

detectors.description:
Deprecated standard detected ! _spender.call(bytes4(bytes32(sha3()(receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes)))),msg.sender,_value,this,_extraData) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UDEFI__1.sol#97):
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
